title: SOLD - 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp - Hal Chase
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp - Hal Chase
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is one more 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp from my collection.  This time it's Hal Chase ("one ear shows").

Technical condition is probably fair/good, although the eye appeal is certainly top notch.  Looking to get $XXX for it.

Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.
